content.question: Do you have an address for your husband/wife?
content.line1: You must provide either a residential address or their solicitor’s address. This can be a UK or international address.
content.line2: The court needs this so that it can send your husband/wife their divorce papers.

screenHasRespondentAddress.required: Select yes if you have an address for your husband/wife
screenHasRespondentAddress.invalid: Select yes if you have an address for your husband/wife

content.question: A oes gennych chi gyfeiriad ar gyfer eich gwr/gwraig
content.line1: Rhaid ichi ddarparu naill ai gyfeiriad preswyl neu gyfeiriad ei gyfreithiwr/chyfreithiwr. Gall hwn fod yn gyfeiriad yn y DU neu’n gyfeiriad rhyngwladol.
content.line2: Mae’r llys angen hyn fel y gellir anfon y papurau ysgariad at eich gwr/gwraig.

screenHasRespondentAddress.required: Dewiswch oes os oes gennych chi gyfeiriad ar gyfer eich gwr/gwraig
screenHasRespondentAddress.invalid: Dewiswch oes os oes gennych chi gyfeiriad ar gyfer eich gwr/gwraig
